lab.blackbox

Class Aquarium

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab.blackbox.Aquarium

  • public class Aquarium
extends java.lang.Object
    Aquarium Lab Series: The Aquarium class defines an Aquarium and its properties.

      Determine the height of the aquarium.
      boolean validLoc(int xCoord, int yCoord)
      This function determines whether the given coordinates specify a valid location (one that exists within the bounds of the aquarium).

      • Aquarium

        public Aquarium(int width,
                int height)
        Construct an Aquarium with user-specified size.
        Parameters:
        width - width of the aquarium when displayed (in pixels)
        height - height of the aquarium when displayed (in pixels)

      • validLoc

        public boolean validLoc(int xCoord,
                        int yCoord)
        This function determines whether the given coordinates specify a valid location (one that exists within the bounds of the aquarium).
        Parameters:
        xCoord - a x coordinate to be checked
        yCoord - a y coordinate to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the specified location is within the bounds of the aquarium
